title: Cannot Connect.
body:
For the past 2 Days i have been unable to join 99% of my games, this is because of the, "Cannot connect to server please check your connection and try again" error message which has been all i see for the past 2 days minus a few random games that i could connect to after 10 minutes of attempts.

Nothing that i have done is working from Re-logging to Running as administrator.

Changing my IPv4 Is not working either.

Help?!

replies.body: Your network is trying to reach the game server but is failing.  Running as admin can troubleshoot a permission problem, but not your connection.  I suggest running through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to tune up your connection and get back in game.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I have done almost all of the TroubleShooting tips and i can now connect to a game...sometimes i almost never connect straight up i have to wait for the error to appear and then cancel and reconnect but even sometimes that doesnt work..I have done almost everything i know. :/

Thanks for trying those steps.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help out.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to attach some logs to the ticket as well, which will give us a better idea of your individual issue.  We'll get back to you!
Also every couple of times i relog the client installs and old patch and re-installs something?
